      <section id="section-content" class="section section-content">
  <div id="zone-content-wrapper" class="zone-wrapper zone-content-wrapper clearfix">  
  <div id="zone-content" class="zone zone-content clearfix container-12">    
    
      
    
    <div class="grid-12 region region-content" id="region-content">
  <div class="region-inner region-content-inner">
    <a id="main-content"></a>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      <div class="panel-display panel-1col clearfix" >
  <div class="panel-panel panel-col">
    <div><div class="panel-pane pane-views pane-news" >
  
      
  
  <div class="pane-content">
    <div class="view view-news view-id-news view-display-id-block_1 news-grid view-dom-id-70efaa6774ef00b9e95226a61f80515e">
            <div class="view-header">
      <div class="view view-news-marquee view-id-news_marquee view-display-id-block news-marquee view-dom-id-eafe7c924f4ed22df48f336952707eb0">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">
    <div class="ds-1col node node-article view-mode-primary_teaser clearfix ">

            a.parentNode.insertBefore(d, a);
        })();
    </script><link rel='preconnect' href='http://s.glbimg.com'><link rel='preconnect' href='http://s2.glbimg.com'><link rel='preconnect' href='http://s3.glbimg.com'><link rel='preconnect' href='http://tags.globo.com'><link rel='preconnect' href='http://tags.tiqcdn.com'><link rel='preconnect' href='http://www.google-analytics.com'><link rel="preload" href="https://s3.glbimg.com/cdn/fonts/opensans/regular.woff2" as="font" crossorigin><link rel="preload" href="https://s3.glbimg.com/cdn/fonts/opensans/bold.woff2" as="font" crossorigin><link rel="preload" href="https://s3.glbimg.com/cdn/fonts/proximanova/regular.woff2" as="font" crossorigin><link rel="preload" href="https://s3.glbimg.com/cdn/fonts/proximanova/bold.woff2" as="font" crossorigin><title>

r;r=document.createElement("link"),r.id=t,r.type="text/css",r.rel="stylesheet",r.href=n,f.appendChild(r)},e.prototype.injectStylesheet=function(e,n,t,o){i(n,t,o,null)},e.prototype.defaultHandler=function(e,n,t,o){window["tinyBasketResult"+e]=window["tinyBasketResult"+e]||{},window["tinyBasketResult"+e][t.toString()]=n},e.prototype.getHandler=function(e,n){return"js"===e?n?this.injectScriptTag:this.injectScript:"css"===e?n?this.injectLinkTag:this.injectStylesheet:this.defaultHandler},e.prototype.skipCacheRequestManager=function(e,n){return g&&(g=window[g]&&"function"==typeof window[g]?window[g]:function(){}),t=function(e,n,t,r,i){return function(s){n.call(o,e,s,r,i),t(s)}},c(w,d(l,{success:t(f,r,g,s,p)}))},e}(),window.tinyBasket=new class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Lollapalooza 2017</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon href="http://g1.globo.com/musica/lollapalooza/2017/noticia/the-xx-consegue-criar-clima-de-intimidade-com-multidao-no-lolla.ghtml" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">The xx consegue criar clima  &quot;intimista&quot; diante de multidão de milhares no Lolla </p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Ingleses pareceram surpresos com recepção do público brasileiro e se emocionaram ao final da apresentação.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="feed-text-wrapper"><div class="feed-post-header with-post-chapeu"><span class="feed-post-header-chapeu">Lollapalooza 2017</span><span class="feed-post-time"><i class="feed-post-time-icon gui-icon gui-icon-clock"></i><span class="feed-post-time-label">há 4 horas</span></span></div><a href="http://g1.globo.com/musica/lollapalooza/2017/noticia/publico-reclama-de-filas-de-ate-uma-hora-para-comprar-bebidas-no-lollapalooza.ghtml" class="feed-post-link"><div class="_label_event"><div><p class="feed-post-body-title gui-color-primary gui-color-hover">Público reclama de filas de até uma hora para comprar bebidas no Lollapalooza</p></div></div><div class="_label_event"><p class="feed-post-body-resumo">Pontos espalhados pelo festival vendem cerveja, refrigerante e outras bebidas. Organização mudou método de pagamento em edição deste ano e disse que novidade reduziria filas. </p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="5"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body"><div class="_label_event"><a curiosos.</p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div class="post-aggregateds"></div></div></div><div class="bastian-feed-item" data-index="10"><div><div class="feed-post type-materia"><div class="feed-post-body-resumo">Banda revelação inglesa fez show lotado com fãs novinhas e vocalista cheio de pose e competente, da new wave ao indie rock. </p></div></a><!--!--></div></div></div><div         </div><span class="gui-color-primary highlight-text">

        </span></a></li><li class="highlight"><a class="gui-image-hover" data-track-click="clique | posicao 4" href="http://g1.globo.com/musica/lollapalooza/2017/noticia/metallica-fecha-1-noite-de-lollapalooza-com-repertorio-renovado.ghtml"><div class="numerozao">
            4
        </div><span class="gui-color-primary highlight-text">
            Metallica volta renovado e comanda multidão com público recorde de 100 mil no Lollapalooza 
        </span></a></li><li class="highlight"><a class="gui-image-hover" data-track-click="clique | posicao 5" href="http://g1.globo.com/musica/lollapalooza/2017/noticia/lollapalooza-aposta-no-rock-pesado-com-metallica-no-1-dia-veja-o-que-esperar-do-festival.ghtml"><div class="numerozao">
            5
        </div><span class="gui-color-primary highlight-text">
            Lollapalooza aposta no rock pesado com Metallica no 1º dia; veja o que esperar do festival
        </span></a></li></ul></div></div></section></div><!-- gerado em: 2017-03-26T02:19:36Z --></div><div class="publicidade publicidade-banner_rm2"><div id="banner_rm2" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div></div><div class="area-direita-b"><section class="gui-card card-opiniao"

  <noscript><iframe src="//www.googletagmanager.com/ns.html?id=GTM-KWJH"
  height="0" width="0" style="display:none;visibility:hidden"></iframe></noscript>
  <script>(function(w,d,s,l,i){w[l]=w[l]||[];w[l].push({'gtm.start':
  new Date().getTime(),event:'gtm.js'});var f=d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
  j=d.createElement(s),dl=l!='dataLayer'?'&l='+l:'';j.async=true;j.src=
  '//www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id='+i+dl;f.parentNode.insertBefore(j,f);
  })(window,document,'script','dataLayer','GTM-KWJH');</script>
  <!-- End Google Tag Manager -->

    <a href="#main-content" class="element-invisible element-focusable">Skip to main content</a>
  </div>
    <div class="page clearfix" id="page">
      <header id="section-header" class="section section-header">
  <div id="zone-menu-wrapper" class="zone-wrapper zone-menu-wrapper clearfix">  
  <div id="zone-menu" class="zone zone-menu clearfix container-12">
    <div class="grid-12 region region-menu" id="region-menu">
  <div class="region-inner region-menu-inner">
        <div class="block block-system block-menu block-main-menu block-system-main-menu odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main-menu">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      <button class="mobile-menu-toggle collapsed"><div class="burger"></div></button><ul class="menu"><li class="first leaf"><a href="/riot-manifesto">About</a></li>

</div></header>    
      <section id="section-content" class="section section-content">
  <div id="zone-content-wrapper" class="zone-wrapper zone-content-wrapper clearfix">  
  <div id="zone-content" class="zone zone-content clearfix container-12">    
    
      
    
    <div class="grid-9 region region-content region-content-article" id="region-content">
  <div class="region-inner region-content-inner">
    <a id="main-content"></a>
            		<h1 class="title" id="page-title">Riot Games Istanbul</h1>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      


<article about="/articles/20160120/255/riot-games-istanbul" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-bsnyder odd clearfix" id="node-article-255">
        <span property="dc:title" content="Riot Games Istanbul" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>	  
    
    <div class="post-date">Posted on 02-15-12</div>		
		<div class="share-bar">
			<a class="print_ico" href="/print/articles/20160120/255/riot-games-istanbul">Print</a>
			<!-- <a class="pdf_ico" href="/printpdf/articles/20160120/255/riot-games-istanbul">PDF</a> -->
			<span class='st_email_custom st_ico' displayText='Email'></span>
			<span class='st_twitter_custom st_ico' displayText='Tweet'></span>
			<span class='st_facebook_custom st_ico' displayText='Facebook'></span>
			<span class='st_linkedin_custom st_ico' displayText='LinkedIn'></span>
			<span class='st_google_custom st_ico' displayText='Google'></span>
			<script type="text/javascript">var switchTo5x=true;</script>
			<script type="text/javascript" src="http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js"></script>
			<script type="text/javascript">
				stLight.options({
		        publisher: 'f65a6e51-8a93-4acd-a665-976809c16a17',
		        onhover: false
		    });</script>
		</div>

    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-field-main-image field-type-image field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><img typeof="foaf:Image" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/article_image/public/content/article/images/main/unnamed.jpg?itok=xatq4mjf" width="700" height="422" alt="" /></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>Rioters in Turkey straddle two continents, as stanbul connects Asia and Europe it also bridges <a href="http://wikitravel.org/en/Istanbul/Sultanahmet-Old_City" target="_blank">past</a> and <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maslak" target="_blank">future</a>. On the Europe side, we visit Taksim Square for a quick cosmopolitan fix. On the Asia side, the Kadk&ouml;y district blends classic architecture with mammoth skyscrapers. Many of us travel between Europe to Asia, so we&rsquo;re used to being in our cars for an hour or two at a time. During work hours, we serve players from the 28th and 29th floors of one of the towering office building near Kadk&ouml;y.</p>
<p>We support a growing region with promotions and publishing efforts that resonate at home &mdash; we even launched here with a Turkish-inspired Tryndamere skin voiced by <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yaTrhwszHTQ" target="_blank">legendary actor Cihan &Uuml;nal</a>. This same community has grown and built up the esports scene in Turkey.</p>
<p>We&#39;re gamers, whether jumping into games of<em> League</em> at our desks or turning on football matches in the conference room. When we want to combine games and sports, Rioters just pop the newest version of FIFA in the console and camp out in the office until the tournament is over. A tight-knit office, we take play to the streets going to premieres of new movies all dressed as James Bond. When the movies over there are pubs, bars, and bazaars to explore and possibly to find a new toy for your office collection. Riot Games stanbul is a city for those who want to be a part of where we&rsquo;ve been and where we&rsquo;re going.</p>
<p class="rtecenter"><a class="intern-btn" href="http://www.riotgames.com/careers/?offices=1424&amp;depts=" target="_blank">Check out Open Jobs</a></p>
<h3>
	Perks beyond the norm:</h3>
<ul>
	<li>
		Flexible hours</li>
	<li>
		Open buffet breakfast every morning and subsidized dinners</li>
	<li>
		Ridiculously cheap vending machine</li>
	<li>
		All-company&nbsp;<a href="http://www.riotgames.com/articles/20131018/582/show-and-tell-stories" target="_blank">&ldquo;Show and Tells,&rdquo;</a>&nbsp;&quot;Taste the Riot&quot; fairs, and&nbsp;<a href="http://thunderdome.riotgames.com/" target="_blank">&quot;Thunderdome&quot; hackathons</a>&nbsp;(infused with adult beverages)</li>
	<li>
		Submit champion ideas directly to the people who make &#39;em real</li>
	<li>
		&quot;Taste the Turkish Delight&quot; stand-ups and &quot;Lean Coffee&quot; meetings</li>
	<li>
		Constant appearances of random baklava trays, donuts, and fruit basket gifts</li>
	<li>
		Riot Games and&nbsp;<em>League of Legends</em>&nbsp;apparel and promotional items</li>
	<li>
		Movie nights where we fill a nearby theater (haven&#39;t missed any of the <em>Avengers</em> or <em>Hobbit</em> movies!)</li>
	<li>
		Regular tabletop game nights/pizza parties</li>
	<li>
		Rioter activity clubs of all kinds ranging from cultural activities to extreme sports</li>
</ul>
<p>Rioters are also hooked up with <a href="/articles/20070101/547/working-riot" target="_blank">better-than-basic benefits</a>.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>
	<link href="http://riot-web-static.s3.amazonaws.com/lib/fancybox/source/jquery.fancybox.css?v=2.0.5" media="screen" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
</p>
 </div></div></div>
    
      <div id="article-gallery" class="clearfix">
        <div class="gallery-title">
          <h3></h3>        </div>
        <div class="gallery-images">
          <div class="superbox-list"> <img src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/gallery_thumbnail/public/content/article/photo-gallery/IMG_6364%20%281%29.JPG?itok=tri1Bgrn" data-img="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/gallery_large/public/content/article/photo-gallery/IMG_6364%20%281%29.JPG?itok=f6ZG0JC5" alt=""> </div><div class="superbox-list"> <img src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/gallery_thumbnail/public/content/article/photo-gallery/IMG_1704.JPG?itok=Agxq79Zn" data-img="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/gallery_large/public/content/article/photo-gallery/IMG_1704.JPG?itok=0Aa6H62_" alt=""> </div><div class="superbox-list"> <img src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/gallery_thumbnail/public/content/article/photo-gallery/352A9307.JPG?itok=iFtRK7Fz" data-img="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/gallery_large/public/content/article/photo-gallery/352A9307.JPG?itok=7HjkgAgM" alt=""> </div><div class="superbox-list"> <img src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/gallery_thumbnail/public/content/article/photo-gallery/352A9297.JPG?itok=V_YIsMBU" src="http://www.riotgames.com/sites/default/files/styles/gallery_thumbnail/public/content/article/photo-gallery/IMG_6347%20%281%29.JPG?itok=f2KFAFds"       </div>

        
    <span class="print-link"></span><div class="field-group-format group_tags field-group-div group-tags clearfix speed-none effect-none"><h3><span>Tags:</span></h3><div class="field field-name-field-topic field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="/topic/riot-manifesto-stories" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Riot Manifesto Stories</a></div><div class="field-item odd"><a href="/topic/rioter-perks" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Rioter Perks</a></div><div class="field-item even"><a href="/categories/category" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Working @ Riot Games</a></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-field-tags field-type-taxonomy-term-reference field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="/tags/istanbul" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Istanbul</a></div><div class="field-item odd"><a href="/tags/riot-games-istanbul" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Riot Games Istanbul</a></div><div class="field-item even"><a href="/tags/culture" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Culture</a></div><div class="field-item odd"><a href="/tags/focus-talent-team" typeof="skos:Concept" property="rdfs:label skos:prefLabel">Focus on talent &amp;   </span>
  <div class="watch-queue-controls">
    <button class="yt-uix-button yt-uix-button-size-default yt-uix-button-empty yt-uix-button-has-icon control-bar-button prev-watch-queue-button yt-uix-button-opacity yt-uix-tooltip yt-uix-tooltip" type="button" onclick=";return false;" title="Previous video"><span class="yt-uix-button-icon-wrapper"><span class="yt-uix-button-icon yt-uix-button-icon-watch-queue-prev yt-sprite"></span></span></button>

    <div id="action-panel-details" class="action-panel-content yt-uix-expander yt-card yt-card-has-padding yt-uix-expander-collapsed"><div id="watch-description" class="yt-uix-button-panel"><div id="watch-description-content"><div id="watch-description-clip"><div id="watch-uploader-info"><strong class="watch-time-text">Published on Sep 21, 2012</strong></div><div id="watch-description-text" class=""><p id="eow-description" class="" >Üye olmak ve League of Legends oynamak için buraya tklayn: <a href="http://signup.leagueoflegends.com/" class="yt-uix-servicelink  " data-target-new-window="True" data-servicelink="CDAQ6TgYACITCIa_vtC589ICFcjkvgodoUcKlyj4HQ" data-url="http://signup.leagueoflegends.com/" rel="nofollow noopener" target="_blank">http://signup.leagueoflegends.com/</a> <br /><br />Dünyann en çok oynanan çevrimiçi PC oyunu League of Legends, tamamen Türkçe içerii ve destei ile seni bekliyor. Tasarm ve oynanyla tamamen kendine özgü 130'un üzerinde ampiyon arasndan istediini seç, takmn kur ve rekabete katl! League of Legends Türkiye YouTube kanalnda; ampiyonlar yakndan tanyabilir, yeni sezon mücadelelerinde en heyecanl anlar yaayabilir ve LoL eitim videolarn bulabilirsiniz. Sen de bu heyecan yaamak ve LoL Türkiye hakknda detayl bilgi almak için tkla: <a href="http://tr.leagueoflegends.com/tr/" class="yt-uix-servicelink  " data-target-new-window="True" data-servicelink="CDAQ6TgYACITCIa_vtC589ICFcjkvgodoUcKlyj4HQ" data-url="http://tr.leagueoflegends.com/tr/" rel="nofollow noopener" target="_blank">http://tr.leagueoflegends.com/tr/</a></p></div>  <div id="watch-description-extras">
    <ul class="watch-extras-section">
            <li class="watch-meta-item has-image ">
    <h4 class="title">
      Game
    </h4>

        </a>
    </span>

      <section id="section-content" class="section section-content">

    <div class="grid-9 region region-content region-content-article" id="region-content">
  <div class="region-inner region-content-inner">
    <a id="main-content"></a>
            		<h1 class="title" id="page-title">Forbes profiles Riot passion</h1>
                        <div class="block block-system block-main block-system-main odd block-without-title" id="block-system-main">
  <div class="block-inner clearfix">
                
    <div class="content clearfix">
      


<article about="/articles/20121015/241/forbes-profiles-riot-passion" typeof="sioc:Item foaf:Document" class="node node-article node-published node-not-promoted node-not-sticky author-bsnyder odd clearfix" id="node-article-241">
        <span property="dc:title" content="Forbes profiles Riot passion" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span><span property="sioc:num_replies" content="0" datatype="xsd:integer" class="rdf-meta element-hidden"></span>	  
    
    <div class="post-date">Posted on 10-15-12</div>		
		<div class="share-bar">
			<a class="print_ico" href="/print/articles/20121015/241/forbes-profiles-riot-passion">Print</a>
			<!-- <a class="pdf_ico" href="/printpdf/articles/20121015/241/forbes-profiles-riot-passion">PDF</a> -->
			<span class='st_email_custom st_ico' displayText='Email'></span>
			<span class='st_twitter_custom st_ico' displayText='Tweet'></span>
			<span class='st_facebook_custom st_ico' displayText='Facebook'></span>
			<span class='st_linkedin_custom st_ico' displayText='LinkedIn'></span>
			<span class='st_google_custom st_ico' displayText='Google'></span>
			<script type="text/javascript">var switchTo5x=true;</script>
			<script type="text/javascript" src="http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js"></script>
			<script type="text/javascript">
				stLight.options({
		        publisher: 'f65a6e51-8a93-4acd-a665-976809c16a17',
		        onhover: false
		    });</script>
		</div>

    
  
  <div class="content clearfix">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even" property="content:encoded"> <p>We opened the doors to our Santa Monica digs for press from around the world in the days leading up to the <a href="/articles/20121017/549/league-legends-season-two-championship" target="_blank"><em>League of Legends&nbsp;</em>Season Two World Championship</a> in Los Angeles.<em> Forbes.com</em>&#39;s&nbsp;Paul Tassi shared his thoughts on the day&#39;s experiences, saying:</p>
<p>&quot;<em>There&#39;s an almost obsessive drive to keep adding value [for] players, something Riot believes is crucial to their success and, really, is their entire company philosophy.&quot;</em></p>
<p><a href="http://www.forbes.com/sites/insertcoin/2012/10/15/league-of-legends-championships-prove-riot-is-on-top-of-the-world/" target="_blank">Flip over to <em>Forbes.com</em> </a>for the whole story.</p>
<p><a href="http://www.forbes.com/sites/insertcoin/2012/10/15/league-of-legends-championships-prove-riot-is-on-top-of-the-world/" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="/sites/default/files/uploads/Forbes-BabySuperman_0.jpg" style="width: 656px; height: 650px; " /></a></p>
 </div></div></div>
        
    <span class="print-link"></span><div class="field-group-format group_tags field-group-div group-tags clearfix speed-none effect-none"><h3><span>Tags:</span></h3><div class="field
